snippet.title: Unsung Story - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Unsung Story for PC is on Early Access! 

Please wishlist the game and help support us as we finish the the remaining chapters! https://bit.ly/unsungsteam

Unsung Story is a spiritual successor to Final Fantasy Tactics with many exciting innovations. The game takes place in Lasfaria, a world with musical magic where the ancient founders created a powerful song called The Opus to store the rules of history, science, and nature. But now, a 77-Year War has damaged that song and reality is coming apart. Players will need to build a team of Unsung Heroes who will start at the the final battle and work their way back in time to save the world.

Kickstarter: https://bit.ly/unsungstory
Official Website: https://bit.ly/unsungsite
Like us on Facebook: https://bit.ly/unsungfb
Follow us on Twitter: https://bit.ly/unsungtwitter

EPIC STORYLINE - Play 6 chapters in non-linear order alongside iconic story characters on both sides of a 77-year War.

MUSICAL MAGIC - Cast spells through songs and coordinated “Harmony” songbook game play.

MISSION DIVERSITY - Engage in 45 diverse missions where none of them look or play the same way.

DEEP PROGRESSION - Mix and match your units across 20 jobs with over 150+ unique abilities.

UNIT CUSTOMIZATION - Solve side quests to collect new options for race, faces, hair, and colors to control the look of all your units.

INCREDIBLE SOUNDTRACK - Listen to an all-new, musical score by world renown composer Hitoshi Sakimoto.
